title: Clear night, slow city driving with frequent braking.
caption: Red car driving slowly on a city street at night with frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 2.4 m/s). There are 20 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is in a residential area with a speed limit of 25 mph. The ego vehicle is maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles and pedestrians to avoid any accidents.
